00025 class Object: public Function {
00026     public:
00027         Object (const QString &, unsigned, unsigned);
00028         virtual ~Object ();
00029         virtual void ReInit (double, double, double,
00030                              double, double, double,
00031                              double, double, double);
00032 
00033         virtual void Transform (double Rxy, double Rxz, double Rxw,
00034                                 double Ryz, double Ryw, double Rzw,
00035                                 double Tx, double Ty, double Tz, double Tw);
00036         virtual void Project (double ScrW, double CamW, bool DepthCue4D);
00037         virtual void Draw (void);
00038 
00039     protected:
00040         unsigned NumVertices, NumSurfaces;
00041         VecMath::Vector<4> *X, *Xtrans;
00042         VecMath::Vector<3> *Xscr;
00043         float *R, *G, *B;
00044 
00045         unsigned *Surface[4];
00046 
00047         virtual VecMath::Vector<4> &f (double, double, double) { return F; }
00048 };

00054 class Hypercube: public Object {
00055 public:
00056     Hypercube (): Object ("Hypercube", 16, 24) {
00057         parameterNames.push_back("Size");
00058     }
00059     Hypercube (double _a, const VecMath::Vector<4> &_Center = VecMath::Vector<4>(0., 0., 0., 0.));
00060     virtual ~Hypercube() { }
00061 
00062     virtual void SetParameters (double _a = 0, double = 0, double = 0, double = 0) {
00063         a = _a; }
00064 
00065     virtual std::string description () {
00066         std::ostringstream out;
00067         out << "Hypercube (a = " << a << ")" << std::ends;
00068         return out.str ();
00069     }
00070 protected:
00071     virtual void Initialize();
00072     void DeclareSquare (unsigned, unsigned, unsigned, unsigned, unsigned);
00073 
00074     double a;
00075     VecMath::Vector<4> center;
00076 };

00097 class Sponge: public Hypercube {
00098 public:
00099     Sponge (unsigned level = 1, int distance = 1, double rad = 1,
00100             VecMath::Vector<4> Center = VecMath::Vector<4>(0., 0.,0., 0.));
00101     virtual ~Sponge ();
00102 
00103     virtual void Transform (double Rxy, double Rxz, double Rxw,
00104                             double Ryz, double Ryw, double Rzw,
00105                             double Tx, double Ty, double Tz, double Tw);
00106     virtual void Project (double ScrW, double CamW, bool DepthCue4D);
00107     virtual void Draw (void);
00108 
00109     virtual void SetParameters (double _a = 0, double _b = 0, double _c = 0,
00110                                 double = 0) {
00111         Level = (unsigned)_a;
00112         distance = (int)_b;
00113         rad = _c;
00114     }
00115 
00116     virtual void ReInit (double, double, double,
00117                          double, double, double,
00118                          double, double, double) {
00119         List.clear();
00120         Object::ReInit(0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0);
00121     }
00122 
00123     virtual std::string description () {
00124         std::ostringstream out;
00125         out << "Sponge (level = " << Level << ")" << std::ends;
00126         return out.str ();
00127     }
00128 protected:
00129     virtual void Initialize();
00130     virtual unsigned long MemRequired (unsigned);
00131     unsigned Level;
00132     std::vector<Hypercube *> List;
00133     int distance;
00134     double rad;
00135     VecMath::Vector<4> center;
00136 };

00142 class Pyramid: public Object {

00145         parameterNames.push_back("Size");
00146     }

00151                 a = _a; }
00152 
00153 protected:
00154     virtual void Initialize();
00155     void DeclareTriangle (unsigned, unsigned, unsigned, unsigned);
00156 
00157     VecMath::Vector<4> center;
00158     double a;
00159 };

00167 class Gasket: public Pyramid {
00168     public:
00169         Gasket (unsigned level = 1, double rad = 1,
00170                 VecMath::Vector<4> Center = VecMath::Vector<4> (0., 0.,0., 0.));
00171         virtual ~Gasket() { }
00172 
00173         virtual void Transform (double Rxy, double Rxz, double Rxw,
00174                                 double Ryz, double Ryw, double Rzw,
00175                                 double Tx, double Ty, double Tz, double Tw);
00176         virtual void Project (double ScrW, double CamW, bool DepthCue4D);
00177         virtual void Draw (void);
00178         virtual void SetParameters (double _a = 0, double _b = 0,
00179                                     double = 0, double = 0) {
00180             Level = (unsigned)_a;
00181             rad = _b;
00182         }
00183         virtual void ReInit (double, double, double,
00184                              double, double, double,
00185                              double, double, double) {
00186             List.clear();
00187             Object::ReInit(0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,0);
00188         }
00189 
00190     protected:
00191         virtual void Initialize();
00192         virtual unsigned long MemRequired (void);
00193         unsigned Level;
00194         std::vector<Pyramid *> List;
00195         double rad;
00196         VecMath::Vector<4> center;
